column4: is there a sound utility in ubuntu?  the module for my soundcard is loaded but alsa says no soundcards detected
and you're sure the right module is loaded?
from lspci: 0000:00:1f.5 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corp. 82801CA/CAM AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 02)
sounds good, what is /etc/init.d/alsa start saying
any conflicting modules? what do you see in lsmod | grep snd?
there loaded: snd_intel8x0m and snd_intel8x0 i think it's the latter i need
yes, unload both, reload snd_intel8x0, and rerun alsa init script
yes, no soundcards found by alsactl
hmm, well, not sure what to do then. Your soundcard should work though
can i get alsaconf from a .deb package?
